children.name: 验证ecshop登录接口成功
parameters: {'extract': {'sid': 'json,$.data.session.sid,0', 'uid': 'json,$.data.session.uid,0'}, 'feature': 'ecshop商城', 'request': {'data': {'name': 'ecshop', 'password': 'ecshop'}, 'method': 'post', 'url': 'http://localhost/ecmobile/?url=/user/signin'}, 'story': '登录接口', 'title': '验证ecshop登录接口成功', 'validate': {'equals': '断言响应状态码是否为200,200,status_code'}}

children.name: 验证是否搜索到商品
parameters: {'extract': {'goods_id': "json,$.data[?(@.name=='P806')].goods_id,0"}, 'feature': 'ecshop商城', 'request': {'data': {'json': "{'filter':{'keywords':'P806','sort_by':'price_asc'}}"}, 'method': 'post', 'url': 'http://localhost/ecmobile/?url=/search'}, 'story': '搜索商品', 'title': '验证是否搜索到商品', 'validate': None}

children.name: 验证商品详情
parameters: {'extract': {'spec': "json,$.data.specification[?(@.attr_type == '1')].value[0].id,1"}, 'feature': 'ecshop商城', 'request': {'data': {'json': "{'goods_id':24}"}, 'method': 'post', 'url': 'http://localhost/ecmobile/?url=/goods'}, 'story': '商品详情', 'title': '验证商品详情', 'validate': {'equals': '断言响应状态码是否为200,200,status_code'}}
